events.name: Science Hack Day Singapore at Suntec Convention Centre, Hall 401-402
events.description: We are happy to announce Science Hack Day Singapore! The event will take place on Nov 11 – 12, 2016 at Suntec Convention Centre as a part of the ICM Youth Festival. Registration is now open at Eventbrite.  http://i0.wp.com/blog.fossasia.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/13432419_1051753604920198_1007694014532108522_n.jpg?resize=660%2C371 WHAT IS SCIENCE HACK DAY?  Science Hack Day is a two-day event where anyone excited about making weird, silly or serious things with science comes together in the same physical space to see what they can prototype. Designers, developers, scientists and anyone who is excited about making things with science are welcome to attend – no experience in science or hacking is necessary, just an insatiable curiosity. Recommended age is 13 and up, though younger students are welcome to attend, with parental accompaniment. http://i2.wp.com/blog.fossasia.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/13516393_1052157271546498_8056031674147160910_n.jpg?resize=660%2C371 The mission of Science Hack Day is to get excited and make things with science! People organically form multidisciplinary teams over the course of a weekend: particle physicists team up with designers, marketers join forces with open source rocket scientists, writers collaborate with molecular biologists, and developers partner with school kids. By collaborating on focused tasks during this short period, small groups of hackers are capable of producing remarkable results. Submit your hack ideas now or team up with other projects https://pad.okfn.org/p/shdsg16  SCHEDULE Thursday, November 10 @7:30pmPre-Event Science Hack Day Idea Pitches  @HackerspaceSG - 344B King George's Avenue Friday, November 11 10:30 Arrive and Check-in 11:00 Official Opening by Science Hack Day Team   11:15 Lightning talks & Team building 12:00 Hack begins 19:00 Door closes Saturday, November 12 10:00 Door opens 11:00 Hack continues 15:00 Hack stops  15:30 Hack demos begin 17:00 Announce winning teams ORGANIZERS  Science Hack Day Singapore is organised by Science Centre Singapore and FOSSASIA. Venue is sponsored by IMDA.  USEFUL LINKS Science Hack Day Intro video: https://youtu.be/Dzb_QCYxi3I Science Hack Ideas for Singapore upcoming event https://pad.okfn.org/p/shdsg16  Get your free ticket at Eventbrite: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/science-hack-day-singapore-tickets-26774249501 Join our facebook page for further annoucement: https://www.facebook.com/events/1647240665595373/
events.location: Suntec Convention & Exhibition Centre level 4, 1 Raffles Boulevard, Suntec City, 039593, Singapore
